# Literature
Distribution
southern AK, across B. Columbia and Alberta, western one-third of the USA
General Habitat
near mountain streams, ponds, or boggy areas
Home or Activity Range
< 1 ac
Specific Habitat Preferences
overhanging banks along cold, rapid mountain streams
Nestsite Characteristics
constructed from leaves and moss often on stream islands
Foraging Habitat Characteristics
forages on ground, downed wood, or in or underwater
Diet
aquatic insects, snails, slugs, earthworms, leeches, small fish, salamanders, mice
Predators
no information available
Shelter Habitats
no information available
Response to Disturbance
n9o information available
Sources of Information used in the Model
no information available
General Sources of Background Information
reviewed in Pearson 1999, Foresman 2001, reviewed in O'Neil et al. 2001

no information available
